Package hotelchain

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BridalSuite
    Represents a Bridal Suite, a special type of hotel room.
    FileHandler
    Handles reading and writing of a file storing an ArrayList of objects and a counter integer.
    Guest
    Represents a guest of a hotel.
    GuestRegistration
    Manages the administration of guests of a hotel chain.
    GuestRegistrationTextInterface
    Provides a text-based user interface towards a Hotel Chain's guest registration system.
    Hotel
    Representation of a hotel.
    HotelChain
    Main class of the HotelChain application.
    HotelChainTextInterface
    Represents the main menu of the HoteChain text-based user interface.
    Main
    Initializes the HotelChain application.
    Reservation
    Represents a reservation made at a hotel.
    ReservationManager
    Manages the Reservations made at a HotelChain.
    ReservationManagerTextInterface
    Provides a text-based user interface towards a HotelChain's reservation management system.
    Room
    Represents of a room in a hotel with a certain room number Implements Serializable so instances can be stored using the FileHandler class.
    TextInterface
    Provides basic functionality of a text-based user interface towards a HotelChain.
